description: Hayward Fire Department is responsible for a broad range of emergency services which include protecting life and property from fire, explosion, hazardous materials, accidents, and disasters. Provides firefighting, rescue response, and the Advanced Life Support (ALS) delivery system with Firefighter-Paramedics. Safe Surrender Site available 24 hours daily, to bring newborn no more than 72 hours old. Permitting parents or legal guardians to confidentially surrender babies without fear of prosecution – no questions asked. Providing needed medical care to surrendered babies and placing them in foster or pre-adoptive homes.  Allowing parents or legal guardians that qualify to exercise a 14-day “reclaim” option. Safe Surrender of Newborn up to 72 hours old. Maybe able to reclaim within 14 days of surrender.Hayward Fire Station Locations: # 1 - 22690 Main Street, at 510-293-8611; # 2 -360 West Harder Road at 510-293-8612; # 3 - 31982 Medinah Street at 510-293-8613; # 4 - 27836 Loyola Avenue at 510-293-8614; # 5 - 28595 Hayward Blvd at 510-293-8615; # 6 -1401 West Winton Avenue at 510-293-8616; # 7 -28270 Huntwood Avenue at 510-293-8617; #8 -25862 Five Canyons Parkway at 510-293-8618; #9- 24912 Second Street at 510-293-8619.
